name: Time for democracy
description:
Strategically domain "time areas" so that,  you can move forward in time, instead of moving back.

Why is "El Valle de los Caídos" (the Valley of the Fallen) still a Francoist regime monument and not a museum? A place where new generations could learn about Spain's Franco's dictatorship and the actual victims?

"Time for democracy" is a metaphor, a protest in the form of a videogame. 

[Only Left & Right Mouse Clicks.]

Many thanks for the help to Lucas González (game design) and Javi Juanco (music).
